statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_name, health_condition FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patient_data WHERE readmission_status = 'Yes'
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patient_data
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, health_condition FROM patient_data WHERE readmission_status = 'Yes' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 40;
SELECT patient_name, age, health_condition FROM patient_data WHERE age >= 50 AND health_condition LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_id, bmi FROM Patients ORDER BY bmi DESC
SELECT gender, age, weight FROM Patients WHERE weight > 70 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM HealthIndicators WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT patient_id, glucose_level FROM HealthIndicators WHERE glucose_level BETWEEN 70 AND 120
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT gender, weight FROM Patients WHERE height > 160 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE bmi < 25 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM HealthIndicators WHERE glucose_level > 100 AND cholesterol_level < 200 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT health_id, patient_id, blood_pressure FROM HealthIndicators WHERE heart_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 100 ORDER BY patient_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_indicators WHERE bmi > 25;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, readmission_date FROM readmission_rates ORDER BY readmission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, diagnosis ASC, gender
SELECT patient_id, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' OR gender='Female'

SELECT patients.patient_id, patients.diagnosis, health_indicators.bmi, health_indicators.blood_pressure FROM patients JOIN health_indicators ON patients.patient_id = health_indicators.patient_id WHERE health_indicators.bmi > 25
SELECT patient_id, age, blood_pressure FROM patients JOIN health_indicators ON patients.patient_id = health_indicators.patient_id WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%high%'

SELECT patients.patient_id, patients.diagnosis, readmission_rates.readmission_date FROM patients LEFT JOIN readmission_rates ON patients.patient_id = readmission_rates.patient_id WHERE readmission_reason IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, discharge_date ASC
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian'
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 1234
SELECT heart_rate, temperature FROM VitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 5678
SELECT patient_id, readmission_date, readmission_reason FROM ReadmissionRates
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian' ORDER BY admission_date ASC;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE treatment LIKE '%Surgery%' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature, oxygen_level FROM VitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM readmission_history ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, gender, ethnicity FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment, admission_date FROM medical_records ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, oxygen_level FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND oxygen_level < 95;
SELECT * FROM readmission_history WHERE reason LIKE '%infection%';
